attributes.title: F*** trump 😌😘🥰

attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking it would be cool and fun. Little did I know it was the exact opposite. The app ate my mom😡. I will never ever get an app with the name trump on it ever again. It chewed her up and swallowed her. So you know what I did to get payback? I ATE THE APP. Anyways I would give this app a 0/1000000 if I could and if anyone wants to keep their moms I’d suggest not getting this app because, Rest In Peace mama💞🥺🙏🏽
attributes.title: This app is completely horrible

attributes.review: as a christian woman and huge fan of mr. donald j trump, i was expecting my great president’s app to be in perfect condition. however, upon opening the app, child pornography popped up!! i decided to simply ✨🧚‍♂️💕not see💕🧚‍♂️✨the horrifying images as many trump supporters, such as myself, tend to ignore trumps pedophilia. after i got past the images, my phone started to smell. like a moldy cheeto puff. i had to throw my whole phone away!! it was horrible!! very bad app!!
attributes.title: APP MAKES PHONE SMELL🤮🤮

attributes.review: I wanted to see how to better support donald trump in his 2020 campaign only to be extremely dissatisfied and disappointed with this disgusting app. When I gave permission for text messages to be sent, I started getting vial messages such as “why do you have such a phat juicy a**, no one will love you” and “you have no lips, how are you gonna kiss kiss?”. I was so disturbed. I had to report this immediately. Very disappointed Mr.Trump, you will not have my vote this fall.
attributes.title: Dissapointed

attributes.review: Today I woke up saw a tiktok and then it told me to rate this app a one star so I’m doing it right now then my brother 🧑🏽🧑🏽started to eat my cat food then he started last coming his self and said he’s taking a bath so I laughed and walked away🏃‍♀️then my cousin called me and said she farted and then she pooped her pants in the kitchen then my brother had to poop and he had poop💩in his but and sat on the carpet then he ran down the hallway with poop on his foot and then he pooped on the carpet then my sister fell down the stairs and told me she smell her armpits before she goes to sleep and then if they stink she licks them🙋🏽‍♀️👅. All because of this app my family is acting weird.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: i got this app in hopes of supporting my wonderful president but i was quickly disappointed. the app cause my dog to shart relentlessly around my kitchen, then cause my husband to slip and fall into all of the dog feces. my husband has severely damaged his back, and we are now thousands of dollars in debt due to hospital bills. very disappointed mr.trump.
attributes.title: terrible, a should be marked as a safety hazard

attributes.review: I was not pleased with the information provided by this app. It seemed to be completely oblivious of true information but you know 🧚🏽‍♀️✨ Dont be shy, delete this fetus from your phone ✨🧚🏽‍♀️
attributes.title: this app is a -1000/10 def don’t recommend

attributes.review: Hey trump!! how is barron doing? i couldn’t imagine the absolute agony he’s going through having to live with you 😞 do you mind if the whole GenZ comes and storms the white house and save him from your filthy racist homophobic cheeto puff ass? NO?!! WOW thank you so much we will be right there!!😃🖕🏻
attributes.title: For Trump 🧚‍♀️💞
